Whenever you draw a card other than the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, create a Glamour token. [i](It’s a colorless enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Sporecap Sprite gets +1/+1 for each other enchantment you control.
